content:
Revise the conversation in this scenario to make it more professional.
Jessica: Greetings, I am the newly hired employee. 
Michael: Welcome aboard, I'm Michael, the team leader.

Jessica: Good morning, I am Jessica, the new team member. It's a pleasure to meet you.  
Michael: Good morning, Jessica. Welcome to the team. I'm Michael, the team leader. We're glad to have you with us.
